unnormalised: Athlete biographies offer great insights. Reading about Milkha Singh's struggles and triumphs inspires. Knowing PV Sindhu's training regime since 06:00 hrs daily, culminating in her 2016 Rio Olympics silver on 19/08/2016, is powerful. Biographies detailing Sachin Tendulkar's early days at Shivaji Park on 24/04/1973 motivate young aspirants. These journeys from small towns like Bhiwani to national icons boost morale.
normalised: athlete biographies offer great insights. Reading about Milkha Singh's struggles and triumphs inspires. Knowing P V Sindhu's training regime since six zero zero hours daily, culminating in her two thousand and sixteen Rio Olympics silver on nineteenth august two thousand and sixteen, is powerful. Biographies detailing Sachin Tendulkar's early days at Shivaji Park on twenty fourth april one thousand nine hundred and seventy three motivate young aspirants. These journeys from small towns like Bhiwani to national icons boost morale.
